remarks: The divisibility relation depends only on the ring's base set and multiplication operation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Dec-2014.)
statement:
rngidpropd.1 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` K ) ) $.
rngidpropd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` L ) ) $.
rngidpropd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( .r ` K ) y ) = ( x ( .r ` L ) y ) ) $.
dvdsrpropd $p |- ( ph -> ( ||r ` K ) = ( ||r ` L ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d L x y $.
$d ph x y $.
